company.name: XpressBees
company.description: XpressBees is a leading tech-powered logistics company in India, delivering over 3 million shipments daily with services covering B2C ecommerce logistics, B2B express delivery, cross-border shipments, and 3PL warehousing solutions across 2,500+ cities and 20,000+ pin codes.
key_strengths: Scalable solutions for businesses of all sizes

b2c_xpress.description: Integrated ecommerce logistics with real-time tracking, COD and prepaid shipments, and extensive last-mile delivery.
features: Real-time order tracking via app and website
Cash on delivery and prepaid orders

b2b_xpress.description: Dedicated express logistics solutions focused on enterprise supply chains requiring secure, fast, and reliable delivery.

cross_border_logistics.description: Cross-border import and export logistics with customs clearance, compliance, and international freight forwarding.

third_party_logistics.description: Comprehensive 3PL warehousing and fulfillment with omni-channel integration supporting inventory, packaging, and delivery.

faqs.question: What does your product do?
faqs.answer: XpressBees provides end-to-end logistics solutions across India, including ecommerce parcel delivery, express B2B shipments, cross-border import-export, and warehousing services that ensure fast, reliable, and tech-enabled delivery.

faqs.question: Do you have a free tier?
faqs.answer: We do not offer a free tier, as our services are customized based on shipment volume, weight, distance, and delivery speed requirements. However, we provide competitive pricing and volume discounts tailored to your needs.

faqs.question: Who is this for?
faqs.answer: Our logistics solutions are designed for ecommerce businesses, manufacturers, pharmaceutical companies, banking institutions, food delivery services, automotive sector clients, and consumer goods companies seeking reliable supply chain and delivery services.

faqs.question: How can I track my shipment?
faqs.answer: Use the tracking number provided by XpressBees on our website or mobile app for real-time shipment status updates.

faqs.question: What is your delivery coverage area?
faqs.answer: We cover over 20,000 pin codes and 2,500+ cities across India.

faqs.question: What delivery options are available?
faqs.answer: We offer standard, same-day, and next-day delivery options depending on the destination.

faqs.question: Do you handle reverse logistics?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide hassle-free returns management and reverse logistics services.

faqs.question: How do I become a partner or use XpressBees for my business?
faqs.answer: Please contact our sales team through the contact page or by phone to discuss partnership or service onboarding.

faqs.question: Which industries do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: We specialize in ecommerce, pharmacy, banking, manufacturing, food delivery, automotive, and consumer goods logistics.

faqs.question: What makes XpressBees different from other logistics companies?
faqs.answer: Our technology-enabled processes, vast network, high on-time delivery rates, and customized solutions make us a preferred partner.

common_objections.objection: Your pricing seems high compared to others.
common_objections.response: Our pricing reflects our high service quality, technology infrastructure, and coverage. We also offer volume-based discounts and customizable plans.
We provide same-day and next-day delivery services in select cities to ensure speed and reliability.

common_objections.objection: We have had issues with tracking in the past.
common_objections.response: Our real-time tracking system is continuously updated to improve accuracy and customer visibility. Our support team is available to assist you anytime.

greetings: Hello! Welcome to XpressBees. How can we assist with your logistics needs today?
Thank you for connecting with XpressBees, India's trusted logistics partner. What can I help you with?
Hi! You're speaking with XpressBees. How may I support your delivery or supply chain requirements today?
lead_capture_flow: May I know your full name?
Could you please share your company name?
Please provide your official email address.
What is your role in the company?
Can you tell me about your primary use case for our services?
What is your team size for logistics management?
When are you looking to start using our services? Immediately, soon, or later?

pricing.general_info: Pricing depends on shipment type, weight, volume, distance, and service level. Customized quotations available upon request.

services_pricing.notes: Most common for ecommerce, with competitive rates.
Premium service available in major cities.

services_pricing.basis: Storage volume, handling, and fulfillment requirements
services_pricing.notes: Flexible packages for businesses of varying sizes.

meeting_types.name: Product Demo
meeting_types.description: Live demonstration of XpressBees logistics platform

meeting_types.name: Business Consultation
meeting_types.description: Discuss your logistics needs and custom solutions
